allow: Bash("C:\Users\user\PycharmProjects\PythonProject\.venv\Scripts\python.exe" -c "import json; data = json.load(open(r''C:\Users\user\Documents\코드3\eth_trade_history.json'', encoding=''utf-8'')); print(f''Total: {len(data)}''); recent = data[-20:]; wins = [t for t in recent if t.get(''balance_change'', 0) > 0]; print(f''Recent 20: Wins={len(wins)}, Losses={20-len(wins)}, Win Rate={len(wins)/20*100:.1f}%''); total_change = sum(t.get(''balance_change'', 0) for t in recent); print(f''Total Balance Change: {total_change:+.6f} ETH'')")
